description: This file is an HTML source for a web-based database visualizer interface. It includes markup, CSS styles, and client-side JavaScript for interacting with databases, tables, and data, enabling users to browse and view database contents in a user-friendly manner.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and renders it.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from data and inserts it into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell with special handling for objects and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data.
